Summary: The error message is shown on the results page after clicking the 'English' option in the 'Books by Language' category list on the 'Subjects' page

Steps to reproduce.2: Click the 'Browse' text button in the header
Steps to reproduce.3: Click  the 'Subjects' option in the drop-down menu
Steps to reproduce.4: Click the 'English' option link in the 'Books by Language' list
Steps to reproduce.5: Pay attention to the message on the results page

Actual result: The 'Unable to render this page' error message is shown on the results page after clicking the 'English' option link in the 'Books by Language' category list on the 'Subjects' page
Expected result: Books in English language are shown on the results page after clicking the 'English' option link in the 'Books by Language' category list on the 'Subjects' page
